meanings.sent1: The library is the quietest place in town.
meanings.sent2: The baby slept through the night in the quietest room.
meanings.sent3: The quietest mouse in the house surprised everyone by squeaking loudly.
meanings.sent4: Her footsteps were the quietest whispers on the forest floor.
meanings.sent5: The quietest hum of the refrigerator was the only sound in the room.

meanings.definition: In a calm or peaceful state
meanings.sent1: She sat quietly by the lake, feeling the quietest she had in years.
meanings.sent2: The wind rustled the leaves, but the forest remained the quietest.
meanings.sent3: After a long day, he finally found the quietest spot to relax - his hammock.
meanings.sent4: The storm passed, leaving the world feeling the quietest it had ever been.
meanings.sent5: The meditation music played softly, creating the quietest atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Showing or characterized by reserve or moderation
meanings.sent1: She had the quietest demeanor, always observing before speaking.
meanings.sent2: His quietest smile revealed his true feelings.
meanings.sent3: The quietest student surprised everyone with a sudden outburst of laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her quietest outfit was a simple black dress.
meanings.sent5: The quietest handshake conveyed more than any words could.
